title: Himi 604
lyrics:
M.L.
(Ko e Tohi Fakahā 2:1;
Ko ‘Aisea 42)
1.
Tū ‘oku faʻa a’ahi mai
‘A e ‘Eiki hono temipale;
Sivi ‘a e ngāue ‘oku fai
‘Eke ‘a e loto fuapē.
2.
Fakafeta’i he fakahā,
Ko e ‘Eiki ‘oku fai totok
a
;
‘O ‘ikai vave ‘ene tal
a
Ke laiki si’a kofe foa.
3.
Ka ai ha maama ulo kov
i
,
‘E ‘ikai te Ne tāmate’i:
Kae hanganaki hono ngaoh
i,
Hei’ilo pē ‘e toe lelei.
4.
Ko au ‘a e kofe ‘oku lau,
‘A e maama ‘oku kohu tu’u,
Ko Meimeihumu ai pē au,
Taupotu ‘i he ta’e ha ngū.
5.
Mālō Ho’ kei kātaki au,
‘O tuku ha’aku me’a ke fai;
Kau faka’amu pē ke taau,
‘Aonga Ho’ fu’u ngāue mai.
6.
‘Omi ke lahi Ho’ kelesi,
Fai’aki pē Ho māfimafi;
Ke u hoko ko e le’o lelei,
Ko e maama ‘oku ulo lahi. *
